title: The protective effects of selenium and boron on cyclophosphamide-induced hepatic oxidative stress, inflammation, and apoptosis in rats
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Mustafa Cengiz, Bahri Gür, Fatma Gür, Varol Şahintürk, Alpaslan Bayrakdar, Ilknur Kulcanay Şahin, Sıla Appak Başkoy, Namık Bilici, Suzan Onur, Yağmur Kaya, İsa Kıran, Özge Yıldırım, Nur Banu Akkaya, Canan Vejselova Sezer, Adnan Ayhanci
